chapter.title: Repository location
chapter.para: By default DataCleaner monitor web application uses a file-based repository location which is relative to the deployed web archive. This makes it easy to deploy and test-drive, but it might not be the best production deployment choice.
To change the repository location, find the file WEB-INF/classes/context/repository-context.xml within the deployed web archive folder. Find the <bean> element which initially looks like this:
